channel.title: Android MediaRecorder on Shaheer Muzammil
channel.description: Recent content in Android MediaRecorder on Shaheer Muzammil

item.title: Recording
item.description: A simple android voice recording application I created a while back. It has following features; Record audio. Pause/Resume between a recording. Control recording bitrate. Save recording to local storage in a folder named Recording. View, Rename or delete all recordings.
